hero.title: Hi, I'm a Frontend Engineer who loves travel and photography
hero.subtitle: Currently on Working Holiday in Australia, sharing tech insights, travel stories, and photography works.

tech.title: Tech Insights
tech.desc: Frontend development experiences, coding tutorials, and tech stack discussions.

travel.title: Travel Stories
travel.desc: Detailed travel guides and personal adventures across Australia.

photo.title: Photography
photo.desc: Portfolio showcasing landscapes, street scenes, and moments.

whv.title: WHV Guide
whv.desc: Australian Working Holiday tips and experiences.

location.title: Currently In Australia
location.desc: Working Holiday Visa (Subclass 417) holder, currently exploring the East Coast while working as a remote frontend developer.

connect.title: Let's Connect
connect.desc: Whether you're interested in frontend development, planning your own Working Holiday adventure, or just want to chat about photography, I'd love to connect!

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.codeDesc: As a frontend engineer, I believe in creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly web experiences that make a difference.
philosophy.lifeDesc: Life is about balance - between coding and adventure, between creating and experiencing, between work and exploration.
philosophy.shareDesc: Through my journey as a developer and traveler, I aim to inspire others to pursue their passions and embrace new experiences.
philosophy.quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.

journey.title: My Journey So Far
journey.description: Started as a frontend developer, I've always been passionate about creating beautiful and functional web experiences. Along the way, I discovered my love for travel and photography, which brought me to Australia on a Working Holiday visa.

background.title: Professional Background
background.skills: Specialized in React, TypeScript, and Modern Web Technologies
background.photography: Amateur Photographer focusing on Travel and Landscape
